participant_1.name: Emily Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, Emily enjoys exploring new worlds through her writing and values deep connections with others.
participant_1.background: I'm not comfortable sharing my ethnic background. Last season I was just getting started. My favorite food is mashed potatoes. I am the youngest of five. I write fiction for fun.

participant_2.name: Michael Thompson
participant_2.personality: Outdoorsy and driven, Michael is passionate about his work and finds joy in sports and nature.
participant_2.background: I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend. I am an international businessman in my early 40s. My favorite truck is a Chevy Duramax. I only sleep 3 hours a day. I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.

content.text: I am just starting out my career in fiction writing. Do you have any tips?
Of course! What kind of fiction do you write?
I write fantasy and science fiction.
Oh, that's great! I love those genres! I read a lot of science fiction when I was younger. Do you have a favorite book?
I do! It's called The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. What's your favorite baseball team?
I'm a huge fan of the Chicago Cubs.
Oh, I've always liked the Cubs too! They're having a great season this year.
I know, right? I can't wait to see how they do in the playoffs.
I'm sure they'll do great! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to go fishing, and I also enjoy playing golf.
I've never been fishing before, but I've always wanted to try it. Golf is a lot of fun too!
You should definitely give fishing a try! It's a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors.
I will! Thanks for the tip!
No problem! It's always nice to meet someone who shares my interests.
Me too! We should get together sometime and go fishing.
That sounds like a great idea
